TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Appointment extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.Item

Docs.summary: Contains the properties and methods used to define an appointment or a meeting. Properties that are available on appointments are defined in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to which this appointment is bound.
Docs.summary: Initializes an unsaved local instance of the class. To bind to an existing appointment, use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults Accept(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function Accept (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

Docs.param: true if a response is to be sent to the organizer; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Accepts the meeting. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: A object that contains the various items that were created or modified as a result of this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults AcceptTentatively(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function AcceptTentatively (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

Docs.param: true if a response is to be sent to the organizer; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Tentatively accepts the meeting. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: A object that contains the various items that were created or modified as a result of this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdjacentMeetingCount As Integer
public: property int AdjacentMeetingCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of calendar entries that are adjacent to the appointment.
Docs.value: The number of calendar entries that are adjacent to the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdjacentMeetings As ItemCollection(Of Appointment)

Docs.summary: Gets a list of meetings that are adjacent to the appointment.
Docs.value: A collection of the meetings that are adjacent to the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowNewTimeProposal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether attendees may propose a new time for the meeting.
Docs.value: true if attendees may propose a new time for the meeting; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentReplyTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime AppointmentReplyTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the time that an attendee replied to the meeting request.
Docs.value: The time that an attendee replied to the meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentSequenceNumber As Integer
public: property int AppointmentSequenceNumber { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates the version number of a changed appointment.
Docs.value: The version number of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentState As Integer
public: property int AppointmentState { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated object is an appointment, a meeting, a response to a meeting, or a cancelled meeting.
Docs.value: The state of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentType As AppointmentType

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates the occurrence type of the appointment; for example, a single meeting, an instance of a recurring meeting, an exception to a recurring meeting, or a master item that contains a meeting recurrence pattern.
Docs.value: One of the enumeration values that specifies the recurrence type of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.Appointment Bind(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ItemId id) cil managed
Public Shared Function Bind (service As ExchangeService, id As ItemId) As Appointment

Docs.param: The service to use to bind to the appointment.
The identifier of the appointment to bind to.
Docs.summary: Binds to an existing appointment and loads its first class properties. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: An instance that represents the appointment that corresponds to the specified ID.
Docs.exception: In specific scenarios, this method can generate an exception similar to the following:System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null.Parameter name: id At System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById(String id)...This can happen if all of the following are true:The object passed in the parameter was created with a value of in the parameter.The MeetingTimeZoneTimeZoneName attribute.If you encounter this exception, you can verify the absence of the TimeZoneName attribute by enabling tracing requests and responsesTo work around this problem, do one of the following:Create the object with a value of or higher in the parameter.Specify a object that does not include the or properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults CancelMeeting() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancels the meeting and sends cancellation messages to all attendees. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: A object that contains the various items that were created or modified as a result of this operation.

Docs.param: Cancellation message text sent to all attendees.
Docs.summary: Cancels the meeting and sends cancellation messages to all attendees with the associated text. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: A object that contains the various items that were created or modified as a result of this operation.

Docs.param: The prefix to prepend to the original body of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Update(valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ConflictResolutionMode conflictResolutionMode, valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.SendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode sendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the enumeration values that indicates how conflicts should be resolved.
One of the enumeration values that indicates if and how invitations or cancellations should be sent if this appointment is a meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property When As String
public: property System::String ^ When { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a text value that indicates when the appointment occurs. The text value is localized by using the Exchange Server culture or by using the culture specified in the property of the object that this appointment is bound to.
Docs.value: A text value that indicates when the appointment occurs.
